Title: Spiral
Writer: Taku Kishimoto (composition), Kei Sambe (manga), Alexander Von David (english script), Yutaka Yasunaga (screenplay)
Actors: Christine Marie Cabanos, David W. Collins, Sara Cravens, Ben Diskin
Plot: Kayo quickly realizes the person who just got on the bus is not Satoru checking in for a late night visit...
